snippets.name: SELECT
snippets.content:
SELECT column1, column2
FROM table_name
WHERE condition
ORDER BY column1;

snippets.name: UPDATE
JOIN
LEFT JOIN
GROUP BY
snippets.content:
SELECT column1, COUNT(*) as count
FROM table_name
GROUP BY column1
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

snippets.name: Subquery
snippets.content:
SELECT *
FROM table_name
WHERE column1 IN (
    SELECT column1
    FROM other_table
    WHERE condition
);

ALTER TABLE table_name

snippets.name: CREATE INDEX
snippets.content:
CREATE INDEX idx_name
ON table_name (column1, column2);

snippets.name: CASE Expression
snippets.content:
SELECT
    column1,
    CASE
        WHEN condition1 THEN 'result1'
        WHEN condition2 THEN 'result2'
        ELSE 'default'
    END AS result
FROM table_name;

snippets.name: COALESCE
snippets.content:
SELECT COALESCE(column1, column2, 'default') AS result
FROM table_name;
